name: The Legend of the Three Crosses
name_original: The Legend of the Three Crosses
description:
A full game. It is an open world RPG.  The main story is finished  and playable, but there is no map for the entire game. There are a few side quests that are playable. The world is big and you are able to do a number of different things.  The game is semi finished but the project has been long dead.  The is a full text guide on the game in the zip file if one wants to follow the quest and beat the game.

(You probably need RPG maker to play it or something that will let you play it)
